title: A Thouless quantum pump with ultracold bosonic atoms in an optical superlattice
title_cn: 在光学超晶格中具有超冷硼原子的Thouless量子泵
abstract: Topological charge pumping enables the transport of charge through an adiabatic cyclic evolution of the underlying Hamiltonian. In contrast to classical transport, the transported charge is quantized and purely determined by the topology of the pump cycle, making it robust to perturbations. Here, we report on the realization of such a pump with ultracold bosonic atoms forming a Mott insulator in a dynamically controlled optical superlattice. By taking in situ images of the cloud, we observe a quantized deflection per pump cycle. We reveal the pump’s genuine quantum nature by showing that, in contrast to ground-state particles, a counterintuitive reversed deflection occurs for particles in the first excited band. Furthermore, we directly demonstrate that the system undergoes a controlled topological transition in higher bands when tuning the superlattice parameters. These results open a route to the implementation of more complex pumping schemes, including spin degrees of freedom and higher dimensions.
abstract_cn: 拓扑电荷泵能够通过基础哈密顿量的绝热循环演化来传输电荷。与经典传输相反，传输的电荷是通过泵循环的拓扑进行量化和纯粹确定的，从而使其对扰动具有鲁棒性。在这里，我们报告了这样一种泵的实现，该泵具有在动态控制的光学超晶格中形成Mott绝缘体的超冷硼原子。通过获取云的原位图像，我们观察到每个泵循环的量化挠度。通过显示与基态粒子相反，第一激发带中的粒子发生反直觉的反向偏转，我们揭示了泵的真正量子性质。此外，我们直接证明，当调整超晶格参数时，系统会在较高的频带中经历受控的拓扑转换。这些结果为实现更复杂的泵送方案（包括自旋自由度和更大尺寸）开辟了道路。

title: Vacuum laser acceleration of relativistic electrons using plasma mirror injectors
title_cn: 使用等离子镜注入器的相对论电子的真空激光加速
abstract: Accelerating particles to relativistic energies over very short distances using lasers has been a long-standing goal in physics. Among the various schemes proposed for electrons, vacuum laser acceleration has attracted considerable interest and has been extensively studied theoretically because of its appealing simplicity: electrons interact with an intense laser field in vacuum and can be continuously accelerated, provided they remain at a given phase of the field until they escape the laser beam. But demonstrating this effect experimentally has proved extremely challenging, as it imposes stringent requirements on the conditions of injection of electrons in the laser field. Here, we solve this long-standing experimental problem by using a plasma mirror to inject electrons in an ultraintense laser field, and obtain clear evidence of vacuum laser acceleration. With the advent of petawatt lasers, this scheme could provide a competitive source of very high charge (nC) and ultrashort relativistic electron beams.
abstract_cn: 使用激光在很短的距离内将粒子加速到相对论能量一直是物理学的长期目标。在为电子提出的各种方案中，真空激光加速吸引了相当大的兴趣，并且由于其吸引人的简单性而在理论上进行了广泛研究：电子与真空中的强激光场相互作用，并且只要它们保持在给定的相位就可以连续加速。直到他们逃脱激光束。但是实验证明这种效果极具挑战性，因为它对激光场中电子的注入条件提出了严格的要求。在这里，我们通过使用等离子反射镜在超强激光场中注入电子来解决这个长期存在的实验问题，并获得真空激光加速的清晰证据。随着petawatt激光器的出现，该方案可以提供极高电荷（nC）和超短相对论电子束的竞争来源。

title: A measure of monopole inertia in the quantum spin ice Yb2Ti2O7
title_cn: 量子自旋冰Yb2Ti2O7中单极惯性的量度
abstract: An important and continuing theme of modern solid state physics is the realization of exotic excitations in materials, known as quasiparticles, that have no analogy in the actual physical vacuum of free space. Although they are not fundamental, such quasiparticles do constitute the most basic description of the excited states of the ‘vacuum’ in which they reside. In this regard the magnetic textures of the excited states of spin ices, magnetic pyrochlore oxides with dominant Ising interactions, have been proposed to behave as effective magnetic charge monopoles. Inelastic neutron scattering experiments have established the pyrochlore material Yb2Ti2O7 (YbTO) as a quantum spin ice, where, in addition to the Ising interactions, there are substantial transverse terms that may induce quantum dynamics and—in principle—coherent monopole motion. Here we report a combined time-domain terahertz spectroscopy (TDTS) and microwave cavity study of YbTO to probe its complex dynamic magnetic susceptibility. We find that the form of the susceptibility is consistent with that of a monopole gas, and a magnetic monopole conductivity can be defined and measured. Using the phase sensitive capabilities of these techniques, we observe a sign change in the reactive part of the magnetic response. In generic models of magnetic excitations this is possible only by introducing inertial effects, such as a mass-dependent term, to the equations of motion. Analogous to conventional electric charge systems, measurement of the conductivity’s spectral weight allows us to derive a value for the magnetic monopole mass. Our results support the idea of magnetic monopoles of quantum spin ice as the true coherently propagating quasiparticles of this system.
abstract_cn: 现代固态物理学的一个重要且持续的主题是在称为准粒子的材料中实现奇异激发，而这种激发与自由空间的实际物理真空没有相似之处。尽管它们不是基本的，但这些准粒子确实构成了对真空激发态的最基本描述。他们居住的地方。在这方面，已经提出了自旋冰激发态的磁性织构，具有主要的伊辛相互作用的磁性烧绿石氧化物表现为有效的磁性单极子。非弹性中子散射实验已经建立了烧绿石材料Yb 2 Ti 2 O 7 （YbTO）作为量子自旋冰，除了在Ising相互作用中，存在大量的横向项，可能会诱导量子动力学和原则上的相干单极运动。在这里，我们报告结合时域太赫兹光谱（TDTS）和YbTO的微波腔研究，以探测其复杂的动态磁化率。我们发现磁化率的形式与单极气体的形式一致，并且可以定义和测量磁单极电导率。使用这些技术的相敏功能，我们观察到了磁响应的电抗部分的符号变化。在磁激励的通用模型中，只有通过将惯性效应（例如与质量有关的项）引入运动方程中，才有可能实现。类似于常规的电荷系统，电导率谱权重的测量使我们能够得出磁单极质量的值。我们的研究结果支持了量子自旋冰的磁单极子作为该系统真正相干传播的准粒子的想法。

title: Minimal model for spontaneous cell polarization and edge activity in oscillating, rotating and migrating cells
title_cn: 振荡，旋转和迁移细胞时自发细胞极化和边缘活性的最小模型
abstract: How cells break symmetry and organize activity at their edges to move directionally is a fundamental question in cell biology. Physical models of cell motility commonly incorporate gradients of regulatory proteins and/or feedback from the motion itself to describe the polarization of this edge activity. These approaches, however, fail to explain cell behaviour before the onset of polarization. We use polarizing and moving fish epidermal cells as a model system to bridge the gap between cell behaviours before and after polarization. Our analysis suggests a novel and simple principle of self-organizing cell activity, in which local cell-edge dynamics depends on the distance from the cell centre, but not on the orientation with respect to the front–back axis. We validate this principle with a stochastic model that faithfully reproduces a range of cell-migration behaviours. Our findings indicate that spontaneous polarization, persistent motion and cell shape are emergent properties of the local cell-edge dynamics controlled by the distance from the cell centre.
abstract_cn: 细胞如何打破对称性并在其边缘组织活动以定向移动是细胞生物学中的一个基本问题。细胞运动的物理模型通常包含调节蛋白的梯度和/或运动本身的反馈，以描述这种边缘活性的极化。然而，这些方法不能解释极化开始之前的细胞行为。我们使用极化和移动鱼表皮细胞作为模型系统，以弥合极化前后细胞行为之间的差距。我们的分析提出了一种新颖且简单的自组织细胞活性原理，其中局部细胞边缘动力学取决于与细胞中心的距离，而不取决于相对于前轴和后轴的方向。我们用一个能够真实再现一系列细胞迁移行为的随机模型验证这一原理。我们的发现表明，自发极化，持续运动和细胞形状是受细胞中心距离控制的局部细胞边缘动力学的新兴特性。

title: Which side are you on?
title_cn: 你支持哪一边？
